date.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the channel associated with the data

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist for which the analytics data is collected

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video within the playlist

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the views were from live streams or on-demand videos

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewers were subscribed or unsubscribed to the channel

country_code.description: The country code of the viewers who watched the playlist videos

playback_location_type.description: The type of location where the videos were played (e.g., embedded player, YouTube site)

traffic_source_type.description: The source from which the traffic to the playlist originated (e.g., YouTube search, external websites)

device_type.description: The type of device (e.g., mobile, desktop) on which the video was watched

operating_system.description: The operating system used by viewers to access the playlist videos

views.description: The total number of views for the videos in the playlist

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time of the playlist videos in minutes

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration in seconds that viewers watch a video in the playlist

playlist_starts.description: The number of times the playlist was started by viewers

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times the playlist was saved or added by viewers

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times the playlist was removed or unsubscribed by viewers
